sentences.english: The resection of occipital condylar and jugular tuber can increase surgical freedom.
sentences.chinese: 枕髁和颈静脉结节的磨除可增加手术视野。

sentences.english: Objectire To summarize and evaluate the effect of surgical treatment on humeral intercondylar fracture.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结评估手术治疗肱骨髁间骨折的疗效。

sentences.english: It was an effective alternative to treat condylar osteoma.
sentences.chinese: 该术式是治疗髁突骨瘤较为理想的方式。

sentences.english: The X-ray lms showed the tibial intercondylar eminence displaced fracture.
sentences.chinese: X线片示胫骨髁间隆突撕脱骨折移位。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinical effects of steel wire fixation in treating the avulsion fracture of the tibial intercondylar eminence.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察胫骨髁间隆突撕脱性骨折的临床治疗效果。

sentences.english: MPR in sagittal and coronary could easily display the shift direction of processus condylaris.
sentences.chinese: MPR冠状及矢状重建可显示髁突移位方向。

sentences.english: No significant difference between disc shift group and disc normal group was found.
sentences.chinese: 盘前移位组与盘正常组的髁突位置差异无显著性。

sentences.english: There was no correlation between disc position and condyle position.
sentences.chinese: 未发现髁突位置与盘突关系之间存在相关关系。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the clinical results of Supracondylar fracture of humerus in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨儿童肱骨髁上骨折的治疗效果。

sentences.english: Influence of inserting occlusal splints on the position of mandibular condyle.
sentences.chinese: 咬合板高度对下颌髁突位置的影响。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, cubitus varus is the most common complication of the supracondylar fracture of humerus.
sentences.chinese: 肘内翻畸形是小儿肱骨髁上骨折常见的并发症。

sentences.english: Conclusion Great morphometric variations were found in occipital condyle.
sentences.chinese: 结论枕髁的形态学变异较大。

sentences.english: Objective To study the relationship between innervation of lateral epicondylar humeri and cervical root nerve.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解肱骨外上髁的神经支配与颈神经根的关系。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the operative effect on intercondylar fracture of femur.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨股骨髁间骨折的手术疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate arthroscopic diagnosis and management of degenerative lesion of femoral intercondylar fossa.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨股骨髁间窝退行性变的诊断及处理。

sentences.english: Objective To describe microsurgical anatomy of the extreme lateral transcondylar approach.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨经远外侧枕骨髁入路的显微外科解剖。

definition: kneecapping/to cut or smash the kneecaps as corporal punishment
ilium/outermost bone of the pelvic girdle/Taiwan pr. [ka4]
ilium (the large flat bone of the pelvic girdle)
articular capsule (of joint such as knee in anatomy)
sacrum (anatomy)/bone forming the base of the spinal column
